Description: Learn the basics of data science
Understand the fundamentals of machine learning algorithms and their applications.
A deep dive into deep learning concepts using TensorFlow.
Learn statistical methods and their applications in R programming.
Visualize data effectively using Python libraries like Matplotlib and Seaborn.
Integrate data science skills to complete a real-world project.
Explore advanced methods for data analysis in Python.
Learn the concepts and tools used in Big Data technologies.
Understand the ethical implications and privacy concerns in data science.
Learn to analyze and forecast time-dependent data.
An introduction to cloud computing concepts and services.
Understand the principles and practices of DevOps.
Learn to automate infrastructure deployment with tools like Terraform.
Overview of network security principles and practices.
Learn how to use Docker to containerize applications.
Understand how to implement CI/CD pipelines in your projects.
Learn how to monitor and log cloud resources effectively.
Explore the principles and practices of Agile project management.
Delve deeper into security practices for cloud environments.
Learn to build applications using serverless architecture.
Comprehensive course covering both front-end and back-end development.
Deep understanding of JavaScript and its best practices.
Create dynamic web applications using React.js.
Learn to build RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.
Build a complete web application using full stack technologies.
Learn the foundational skills of web design with HTML and CSS.
Create responsive web designs that work on multiple devices.
Understand the principles of database management and SQL.
Explore the design and development of APIs and microservices.
Learn the basics of software testing methodologies and practices.
